title: The Best KDP Keyword Research Tool For Beginners [2024]

tactics.name: Free Keyword Mining
tactics.description: Use Seller Sprite's keyword mining tool to identify high-demand, low-competition keywords for Amazon KDP.
steps: Create a free Seller Sprite account
Navigate to Keyword Sprite > Keyword Mining
Analyze metrics like monthly searches and SPR score
caveats: Free data may lack granularity compared to paid tools
source_quotes: 'the lower number you have the better it's going to be for you'

tactics.name: DSR Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate keyword opportunity using demand to supply ratio (DSR) to balance search volume and competition
steps: Calculate DSR by dividing search volume by product count
Compare with BSR to assess ranking potential
caveats: Avoid keywords with declining search trends
source_quotes: higher DSR number is the better opportunity

tactics.name: Competitor Reverse ASIN
tactics.description: Analyze competitor keywords by reverse ASIN lookup to identify high-performing terms
steps: Extract keywords from their backend titles/keywords
caveats: Requires KDP books for accurate data
source_quotes: look at your competitors's books and see what keywords they're using

tactics.name: Competitor ASIN Analysis
tactics.description: Use free keyword research tools to analyze competitors' books by inputting their ASIN and reviewing organic/paid keyword data
steps: Input ASIN into keyword research tool
Filter keywords by relevance and search volume
caveats: Free version excludes paid ad data
source_quotes: I don't think it includes all of the data here because as you can see it says there's organically 31 keywords

tactics.name: Free Keyword Research Tool
tactics.description: Best free keyword research software for Amazon KDP in 2024
source_quotes: this is all as I say entirely free so a really good piece of keyword research software

heuristics.name: Demand vs Competition Balance
heuristics.condition: If daily searches exceed 500 and SPR score is below 100, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: 'you want to have high demand and you want to have low competition'

heuristics.name: DSR Threshold Rule
heuristics.condition: If DSR > 0.8 and BSR < 50,000, then boost keyword opportunity
source_quotes: higher DSR number is the better opportunity

heuristics.name: Keyword Trend Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If a keyword has high monthly searches but low competition, prioritize it for targeting
source_quotes: unicorn coloring book is the one that drives most of the traffic it's the highest line here monthly searches at one point got to 33,000

heuristics.name: Boost Low-Review Niches
source_quotes: if you do want a full tutorial of how to use every single tool within this

claims.statement: Seller Sprite provides free keyword research metrics including monthly searches and SPR scores.
source_quotes: 'this is entirely free so we're just going to go for the last 30 days'

claims.statement: DSR (Demand to Supply Ratio) indicates keyword opportunity by comparing search volume to product count
source_quotes: DSR products metric... divides the search volume by the number of items

claims.statement: Free keyword research tools provide partial data compared to premium versions
source_quotes: it's not quite as good as the paid pieces but it still gives you a really good bit of information

claims.statement: Publisher Rocket is the best free keyword research software for Amazon KDP in 2024
source_quotes: this is all as I say entirely free so a really good piece of keyword research software

niche_patterns.description: Target specific demographics with age-based keyword variations
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Captures niche demand while maintaining search volume
